message:
You should be able to modify AsyncCommand to just thread through the parameter. I've never needed it myself, which is why it wasn't in the code for those articles.

Alternatively, I have a newer version of the AsyncCommand type here that does pass along the parameter: [https://github.com/StephenCleary/Mvvm.Async](https://github.com/StephenCleary/Mvvm.Async)
